author: Isaac Dachen
title: Lady under fire for posting after sex photos with boyfriend - Filla - Pulse
text: 24/7 Live - Subscribe to the Pulse Newsletter! Subscribe 24/7 Live - Subscribe to the Pulse Newsletter! Back to Article A young Nigerian lady has come under fire after she posted photos of herself and her boyfriend before and after sex, with many believing, she has debased herself and womanhood. ALSO READ : “Naughty By Nature: Nigerian lady tears social media apart with nude birthday pictures (Photos)” The lady who goes by the name Dopest Queen and claims to be based in Terni, a city in the southern portion of the Region of Umbria in central Italy, says the man she calls Osaro Felix , gives her the best sex and whenever he is out of town, she misses the steamy sessions with him. play But many people have risen to the lady defense saying she has a right to express her opinion and let everyone know she is proud of her man while some still think as a Nigerian, she has no respect for herself and her culture. This is how Dopest Queen captured her moment on her Facebook page: "Before and after sex with my boo Osaro (Osas Felix) in Terni. More of your d**k for my p***sy boo boo. Friends I miss his sweet d**k... help me o. Happy Sunday to you all."
